mapper.select: SELECT DET_ID, DET_NM FROM CODE_DETAIL WHERE COD_ID = #{codId} AND DET_YN = 'y' ORDER BY DET_SORT

SELECT 'prc_' || pl.prc_lot_id AS id, prc.prc_nm || ' / ' || prc.prc_code || ' (' || cd.det_nm || ')' AS text, -- ✅ 상태 이름 표시 0 AS children FROM process_lot pl JOIN prdLot_processLot_mapping map ON pl.prc_lot_id = map.prc_lot_id JOIN process prc ON pl.prc_id = prc.prc_id JOIN product_lot pl2 ON pl.prd_lot_id = pl2.prd_lot_id JOIN suju_order_detail sod ON pl2.odd_id = sod.odd_id JOIN work_order wo ON sod.odd_id = wo.odd_id JOIN ( SELECT wp1.wrk_id, wo1.prc_id, wp1.wpo_status FROM work_process wp1 JOIN work_order wo1 ON wp1.wrk_id = wo1.wrk_id -- ✅ prc_id를 work_order에서 가져옴 JOIN ( SELECT wp2.wrk_id, MAX(wpo_id) AS max_wpo_id FROM work_process wp2 GROUP BY wp2.wrk_id ) latest ON wp1.wrk_id = latest.wrk_id AND wp1.wpo_id = latest.max_wpo_id ) wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id AND wp.prc_id = pl.prc_id -- ✅ process_lot과 동일 공정 매칭 JOIN code_detail cd ON wp.wpo_status = cd.det_id -- ✅ 상태 이름 가져오기 WHERE map.prd_lot_id = #{prdLotId}

SELECT 'mat_' || ml.mat_lot_id AS id, m.mat_nm || ' (' || m.mat_cd || ')' AS text, 0 AS children FROM product_lot pl JOIN suju_order_detail sod ON pl.odd_id = sod.odd_id JOIN sujuOrdDetail_matLot_mapping som ON sod.odd_id = som.odd_id JOIN material_lot ml ON som.matlot_id = ml.mat_lot_id JOIN material m ON ml.mat_id = m.mat_id WHERE pl.prd_lot_id = #{prdLotId}

SELECT DISTINCT 'eqp_' || eq.eqp_id AS id, eq.eqp_name || ' / ' || eq.eqp_code AS text, 0 AS children FROM process_lot pl JOIN equipment eq ON pl.eqp_id = eq.eqp_id JOIN prdLot_processLot_mapping map ON pl.prc_lot_id = map.prc_lot_id WHERE map.prd_lot_id = #{prdLotId}

SELECT DISTINCT pl.prd_lot_code AS "lotCode", e.emp_nm AS "orderName", e.emp_num AS "orderNum", p.prd_nm AS "productName", p.prd_code AS "productCode", cd1.det_nm AS "size", cd2.det_nm AS "color", cd3.det_nm AS "type", cd4.det_nm AS "status", cd5.det_nm AS "productType", cd6.det_nm AS "height", sod.odd_cnt AS "orderCount", pl.prd_lot_start_date AS "startDate", pl.prd_lot_end_date AS "endDate" FROM product_lot pl JOIN suju_order_detail sod ON pl.odd_id = sod.odd_id JOIN product_option po ON sod.opt_id = po.opt_id JOIN product p ON po.prd_id = p.prd_id JOIN code_detail cd1 ON po.opt_size = cd1.det_id JOIN code_detail cd2 ON po.opt_color = cd2.det_id JOIN code_detail cd3 ON p.prd_type = cd3.det_id JOIN code_detail cd4 ON pl.prd_lot_status = cd4.det_id JOIN code_detail cd5 ON p.prd_type = cd5.det_id JOIN code_detail cd6 ON po.opt_height = cd6.det_id JOIN work_order wo ON sod.odd_id = wo.odd_id JOIN employee e ON wo.wrk_ord_empId = e.emp_id WHERE pl.prd_lot_id = #{prdLotId}

SELECT pl.prc_lot_id, dep_cd.det_nm AS "departmentName", -- 담당부서명 team_cd.det_nm AS "teamName", -- 담당팀명 pl.erp_nm AS "operatorName", -- 공정장 이름 pl.erp_num AS "operatorNum", -- 공정장 사번 wp.wpo_start_date AS "processStartDate",-- 공정시작일 wp.wpo_end_date AS "processEndDate", -- 공정종료일 wp.wpo_jcount AS "successCount", -- 공정별 생산수량 NVL(qh.qhi_bcount, 0) AS "failCount", -- 공정별 불량수량 e.eqp_name AS "usedEquipmentName", -- 사용설비명 e.eqp_code AS "usedEquipmentCode", -- 사용설비코드 cd.det_nm AS "processStatus" -- 공정진행상태 FROM process_lot pl JOIN product_lot pl2 ON pl.prd_lot_id = pl2.prd_lot_id JOIN suju_order_detail sod ON pl2.odd_id = sod.odd_id JOIN work_order wo ON sod.odd_id = wo.odd_id JOIN work_process wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id AND wpo_step = ( SELECT MAX(wp1.wpo_step) FROM work_process wp1 JOIN work_order wo1 ON wp1.wrk_id = wo1.wrk_id WHERE wp1.wrk_id = wo1.wrk_id AND prc_id = pl.prc_id ) LEFT JOIN quality_history qh ON wp.wpo_id = qh.qhi_target_id JOIN process prc ON pl.prc_id = prc.prc_id JOIN equipment e ON pl.eqp_id = e.eqp_id JOIN code_detail cd ON wp.wpo_status = cd.det_id -- ✅ 공정장 → employee → 부서명/팀명 LEFT JOIN employee emp ON pl.erp_num = emp.emp_num LEFT JOIN code_detail dep_cd ON emp.emp_dep_cd = dep_cd.det_id LEFT JOIN code_detail team_cd ON emp.emp_team_cd = team_cd.det_id WHERE pl.prc_lot_id = #{prcLotId}

SELECT ml.mat_lot_code AS "materialLot", m.mat_nm AS "materialName", m.mat_cd AS "materialCode", smm.used_qty AS "materialCount", ml.mat_date AS "materialDate", c.cli_nm AS "materialPartner", c.CLI_MGR_NAME AS "materialManager", c.CLI_MGR_PHONE AS "materialPhone" FROM material_lot ml JOIN material m ON ml.mat_id = m.mat_id JOIN sujuorddetail_matlot_mapping smm ON ml.mat_lot_id = smm.matlot_id JOIN client c ON m.cli_id = c.cli_id WHERE ml.mat_lot_id = #{matLotId}

SELECT DISTINCT e.eqp_name AS "equipmentName", e.eqp_code AS "equipmentCode", c.cli_nm AS "equipmentPartner", c.CLI_MGR_NAME AS "equipmentManager", c.CLI_MGR_PHONE AS "equipmentPhone", p.prc_nm AS "usedProcessName", p.prc_code AS "usedProcessCode" FROM equipment e JOIN client c ON e.cli_id = c.cli_id JOIN process_lot pl ON e.eqp_id = pl.eqp_id JOIN process p ON pl.prc_id = p.prc_id WHERE e.eqp_id = #{eqpId}

SELECT #{oddId} AS "odd_id", 'LOT-' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '-' || p.prd_code || '-' || cd1.det_nm || '-' || cd2.det_nm || '-' || LPAD(NVL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_lot pl JOIN suju_order_detail sod2 ON pl.odd_id = sod2.odd_id JOIN product_option po2 ON sod2.opt_id = po2.opt_id WHERE TO_CHAR(pl.prd_lot_start_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND po2.prd_id = po.prd_id AND po2.opt_size = po.opt_size AND po2.opt_color = po.opt_color ), 0) + 1, 3, '0') AS "prd_lot_code", LPAD(NVL(( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM product_lot pl JOIN suju_order_detail sod2 ON pl.odd_id = sod2.odd_id JOIN product_option po2 ON sod2.opt_id = po2.opt_id WHERE TO_CHAR(pl.prd_lot_start_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND po2.prd_id = po.prd_id AND po2.opt_size = po.opt_size AND po2.opt_color = po.opt_color ), 0) + 1, 3, '0') AS "prd_lot_sort", SYSDATE AS "prd_lot_start_date", 'lot_status_01' AS "prd_lot_status" FROM suju_order_detail sod JOIN product_option po ON sod.opt_id = po.opt_id JOIN product p ON po.prd_id = p.prd_id JOIN code_detail cd1 ON po.opt_size = cd1.det_id JOIN code_detail cd2 ON po.opt_color = cd2.det_id WHERE sod.odd_id = #{oddId} AND ROWNUM = 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product_lot ( prd_lot_code, odd_id, prd_lot_start_date, prd_lot_sort, prd_lot_status ) VALUES ( #{prd_lot_code}, #{odd_id}, #{prd_lot_start_date}, #{prd_lot_sort}, #{prd_lot_status} )
mapper.select: SELECT wo.wrk_id as "wrk_id", wo.prc_id as "prc_id", wo.wrk_ord_empId AS "wrk_ord_empId", wpo.wpo_team AS "wpo_team" FROM work_order wo JOIN work_process wpo ON wo.wrk_id = wpo.wrk_id WHERE wo.odd_id = #{oddId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO process_lot ( prd_lot_id, prc_id, erp_nm, erp_num, prc_lot_start_date, prc_lot_end_date, prc_lot_status, eqp_id ) VALUES ( #{prdLotId}, #{prc_id}, (SELECT emp.emp_nm -- ✅ 공정장의 이름 FROM work_order wo JOIN process prc ON wo.prc_id = prc.prc_id JOIN employee emp ON emp.emp_dep_cd = prc.det_id AND emp.emp_team_cd = #{wpo_team} AND emp.emp_pos_cd = 'pos_04' WHERE wo.wrk_id = #{wrk_id} AND ROWNUM = 1), (SELECT emp.emp_num -- ✅ 공정장의 사번 FROM work_order wo JOIN process prc ON wo.prc_id = prc.prc_id JOIN employee emp ON emp.emp_dep_cd = prc.det_id AND emp.emp_team_cd = #{wpo_team} AND emp.emp_pos_cd = 'pos_04' WHERE wo.wrk_id = #{wrk_id} AND ROWNUM = 1), NULL, NULL, (SELECT wpo_status FROM work_process wp WHERE wp.wrk_id = #{wrk_id} AND ROWNUM = 1), -- work_process.wpo_status (공정진행상태) (SELECT eqp.eqp_id -- 사용설비ID FROM equipment eqp JOIN process prc ON eqp.prc_id = #{prc_id} JOIN employee emp ON emp.emp_team_cd = eqp.emp_team WHERE prc.det_id = emp.emp_dep_cd AND prc.prc_id = #{prc_id} AND emp_pos_cd = 'pos_04') )
mapper.select: SELECT prc_lot_id FROM process_lot WHERE prd_lot_id = #{prdLotId} AND prc_id = #{prc_id} ORDER BY prc_lot_id DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT NVL(MAX(SUBSTR(mat_lot_code, -3)), 0) FROM material_lot WHERE mat_id = #{mat_id} AND TO_CHAR(mat_date, 'YYYYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') AND mat_lot_code LIKE '%' || #{mat_code} || '%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_lot ( mat_lot_code, mat_id, mat_date, mat_sort, are_id, mat_cnt ) VALUES ( #{mat_lot_code}, #{mat_id}, sysdate, #{mat_sort}, #{are_id}, #{whs_his_cnt} )
mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN wp.wpo_step = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_first_process FROM work_process wp WHERE wp.wpo_id = #{wpoId}
mapper.update: UPDATE product_lot SET prd_lot_status = 'lot_status_02' WHERE prd_lot_id = ( SELECT pl.prd_lot_id FROM product_lot pl JOIN suju_order_detail sod ON pl.odd_id = sod.odd_id JOIN work_order wo ON sod.odd_id = wo.odd_id JOIN work_process wp ON wp.wrk_id = wo.wrk_id WHERE wp.wpo_id = #{wpoId} )
